data.title: Privilege Ibiza 2016
data.meta_description: Privilege Ibiza 2016 including the events, DJ line Ups, club tickets and more.
data.text:
Privilege Ibiza 2015 is famed for holding the title of the ‘World’s Biggest Club???, located right in the middle of San Antonio. In full-force, it???s an eye-opening experience: the main room itself can fit several other clubs on the island within it. In this vast arena, thousands of party people dance around a huge indoor pool with lots of different areas to check out. On top of this, there???s another club called the Vista Club, the Vista Blue room, the Coco Loco room, a restaurant and a multi-level chillout area with a garden.

Known for its spectacular and grand shows, Privilege Ibiza 2015 will host a lot of large-scale parties rather than your typical Ibiza DJ-focused club nights. As such, you will often see huge paint fights and water parties going on inside.

With layers upon layers of club to explore, you???re going to want to stay close to your friends or you???ll lose them for the rest of the night. Due to the sheer size of it, the whole club is only opened fully on its biggest nights, although you will be blown away by the grandiosity of the place even on a quieter one

Capacity: Over 10,000

Dress Code: Casual

Drink Prices: A spirit and mixer costs around ???12 and a beer ???10.

Privilege 2016 Parties

This year Privilege is bringing both new and old parties back to this undisputed super club for a summer big enough to match the unbelievable club size.

Connect Ibiza is new to the Island this year and promises a diverse range of day and night trance parties every Tuesday. Starting from the the Opening Party on the 7th July through for 10 dates until the Closing Party on 8th September.

Life In Color began 10 years ago in a Florida college campus, it has now had a revamp for the party island of Ibiza. The Opening Party is on the 17th June running until the Closing Party on the 9th September every Wednesday for 13 dates.

SupermartXe is one of the biggest Spanish clubbing nights on the island taking place every Friday. This weekly theme changing night begins on the Opening Party on the 12th June running until the 25th September.

The legendary house label, Hard Times is finally landing in the White Isle. With 10 Saturday night slots across the Summer starting with the Opening Party on 20th June through to the Closing Party 12th September.

Do Not Sleep is brand new to the Privilege for 2015 and sets out to be one of the biggest house and techno nights on the island. Every Sunday beginning with a warm up party on the 14th of June. In preparation for the huge Opening Party taking place on the 12th July with 10 nights across the Summer with the Closing Party on the 6th September.

How to get to Privilege

???10-15 in a taxi from San Antonio, Ibiza Town or Playa D’en Bossa.

Disco buses run all night direct from Ibiza and Playa d’en Bossa to San Antonio and vice versa. There are also special free buses for ticket holders from locations in Playa D’en Bossa, Ibiza Port and San Antonio.

Address: Urbanizaci??n San Rafael, s/n, 07816 San Rafael, Balearic Islands, Spain

History

Begining as Ku more than 20 years ago makes it an integral part in the whole Ibiza story. Manumission was one of the world???s most famous parties for over a decade. The unique swimming pool in the centre of the main room alongside layers and layers of clubs different rooms in the club to explore make it a unique clubbing experience that will forever go down in history.

The club???s most notorious party was Manumission, which spent over a decade at the club and went down in history as of the world???s best parties. Alongside the club???s extreme size came extreme entertainment; live sex shows at these parties occurred until its end in 2007. Although this tradition has ended, there???s still some raunchy
